If compass HDG is 340°  and deviation +3
What is magnetic heading?

options.text: Deviation is positive (Easterly), therefore magnetic heading is 343°.
Deviation is positive (Westerly), therefore magnetic heading is 343°.
Deviation is positive (Easterly), therefore magnetic heading is 337°.
Deviation is positive (Westerly), therefore magnetic heading is 337°.
